Question
========

The variable Happiness, in which adult Dutch people indicate with a number between 0 and 10 how happy they are, is normally distributed with a mean of 6.5 and a standard deviation of 1. What percent of adult Dutch people give his/her life an 8 or higher?

* Int*: Calculate the z-score. 
Answerlist
----------
* 6.68%
* 15.87%
* 44.04%
* 0.62%
